title: Linux Foundation Backs 'Valkey' Open Source Fork of Redis
author: Joab Jackson
description: Redis CEO scoffs at the fork, characterizing it as an underhanded ploy of the cloud providers to avoid paying licensing fees.
cntitle: Linux 基金会支持 Redis 的开源分支“Valkey”
cndescription: Redis 首席执行官嘲笑该分支，称其为云提供商为避免支付许可费而采取的卑鄙策略。
